article_text:
Smoke Alarms on EgyptAir Flight Hint at Cause of Crash

05:06 - Mark Martin, founder and chief executive officer at Martin Consulting, discusses what may have happened to EgyptAir flight 804. He speaks to Manus Cranny on "Bloomberg Markets Middle East." (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description: Greek Minister of Tourism Elena Kountoura discusses the state of tourism in Greece and the country’s ongoing talks with creditors. She speaks with Elliott Gotkine on Bloomberg Television's “The Pulse.” (Source: Bloomberg)
